snippet: Representatives of 58 civic organizations, including religious, legal and human rights groups, condemned what they called an escalating campaign against critics of President Robert Mugabe’s party.
abstract: Representatives of 58 civic organizations in Zimbabwe, including religious, legal and human rights groups, condemn what they call an escalating campaign against critics of Pres Robert Mugabe’s party.
lead_paragraph: Representatives of 58 civic organizations, including religious, legal and human rights groups, condemned what they called an escalating campaign against critics of President Robert Mugabe’s party.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
